Allen Iverson denies this, as he wrote on his Twitter account: I have never said anything about retirement, nor have I said goodbye to the game of basketball. Once I get past this, my plan is to continue playing at the highest level possible. So don't put me in my rocking chair just yet. Hold on, I'll be back!
